nodes.text: The Cobral was the criminal organization that controlled the planet Frego during the decades prior to the Invasion of Naboo.

The Cobral was a group of smugglers and black market dealers founded by the Cobral family who eventually took over the planetary government of the planet Frego, in the Core Worlds, during the last decades of the Old Republic. The Cobrals lost control over Frego when one of the children of the family, Solan Cobral, killed his brother Rutin to ensure his place as head of the family.
After the Cobrals leaders were imprisoned, some of its members relocated to Naboo's moon of Rori which became their base of operations and established the Neo-Cobral.
